button.label: Copy Visible Cells
button.screentip: Copies only visible cells from a selection

button.label: Clean Data
button.screentip: Removes all nonprintable characters from text

button.label: Convert to NULL
button.screentip: Replaces the zero string values with 'NULL'

button.label: Format Date Columns
button.screentip: Update the default date format of the cell

button.label: Clear Interior Color
button.screentip: Clear the interior color of cells

button.label: Separate Values
button.screentip: Separate values into new rows from the selected column by a delimited string value setting

menu.label: Add Script Column
menu.screentip: The selected button will change the script string format.

button.label: T-SQL Create Table
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a T-SQL CREATE TABLE script.

button.label: T-SQL Insert Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a T-SQL INSERT VALUES script.

button.label: T-SQL Merge Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a T-SQL MERGE VALUES script.

button.label: T-SQL Select Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a T-SQL SELECT VALUES script.

button.label: T-SQL Select Union
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a T-SQL SELECT UNION script.

button.label: T-SQL Update Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a T-SQL UPDATE VALUES script.

button.label: PL/SQL Create Table
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a PL/SQL CREATE TABLE script.

button.label: PL/SQL Insert Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a PL/SQL INSERT VALUES script.

button.label: PL/SQL Merge Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a PL/SQL MERGE VALUES script.

button.label: PL/SQL Select Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a PL/SQL SELECT VALUES script.

button.label: PL/SQL Select Union
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a PL/SQL SELECT UNION script.

button.label: PL/SQL Update Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a PL/SQL UPDATE VALUES script.

button.label: DQL Append
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a DQL APPEND script (This is used for repeating values).

button.label: DQL Append/Locked
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a DQL APPEND script (This is used for repeating values) and also unlocks and locks the metadata.

button.label: DQL Create
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a DQL CREATE script.

button.label: DQL Truncate/Append
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a DQL TRUNCATE/APPEND script (This is used for removing all repeating values and then updating to one value).

button.label: DQL Update
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a DQL UPDATE script.

button.label: DQL Update/Locked
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a DQL UPDATE script and also unlocks and locks the metadata.

button.label: GitHub Table
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a GitHub table script (This is used for READ ME files).

button.label: HTML Table
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a HMTL Table script.

button.label: XML Values
button.screentip: This changes the query string to a XML script.

comboBox.label: Table Alias:
comboBox.screentip: This is the table alias used in the query string.

comboBox.label: Date Format:
comboBox.screentip: This is the format used for updating the date columns.

comboBox.label: Paste Format:
comboBox.screentip: This is the paste format from SQL Server Management Studio.

button.screentip: This will open the table alias list.
This will open the date format list.
This will open the date format list.

button.label: Create File List
button.screentip: Create a file listing

button.label: Settings
button.screentip: The settings for this Add-In

button.label: How To...
button.screentip: How to use this Excel Add-In

button.label: API Doc...
button.screentip: View API documentation for this product
